channel.title: MOHAA lmao idk randomsness
channel.description:
Some of u must have play MOHAA or one of the MOH, maybe COD...idk
but just for a giggly i am posting a map i edited,so people can see what i am God off,hehe
[code]// SOUTHERN FRANCE // ARCHITECTURE: SENN // SCRIPTING: POWZER
main:
// set scoreboard messages setcvar "g_obj_alliedtext1" "Southern France" setcvar "g_obj_alliedtext2" "208.101.42.36:12203" setcvar "g_obj_alliedtext3" "Mods by Raven_weasel" setcvar "g_obj_axistext1" "Southern France 2" setcvar "g_obj_axistext2" "Small City" setcvar "g_obj_axistext3" "Toy Soldiers"
setcvar "g_scoreboardpic" "mohdm1"
// call additional stuff for playing this map round based is needed if(level.roundbased) thread roundbasedthread
level waitTill prespawn
local.fix1 = spawn script_model local.fix1 model "static/lightpost_sidemounted.tik" local.fix1.origin = ( 1366.00 1335.00 743.00 ) local.fix1.angles = ( 180 90 180 )
local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple local.trig.origin = ( 1366.00 1335.00 760.00 ) local.trig setsize ( -150 -150 -0 ) ( 150 150 0 ) local.trig setthread Trigger1 local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area"
local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple local.trig.origin = ( -395.29 112.88 461.49 ) local.trig setsize ( -50 -25 -0 ) ( 50 25 0 ) local.trig setthread Trigger1 local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area" local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple local.trig.origin = ( -742.54 2190.88 644.13 ) local.trig setsize ( -50 -50 -0 ) ( 50 50 0 ) local.trig setthread Trigger1 local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area"
local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple local.trig.origin = ( -634.49 1912.87 328.13 ) local.trig setsize ( -50 -50 -0 ) ( 50 50 0 ) local.trig setthread Trigger1 local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area"
local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple local.trig.origin = ( -770.42 1912.87 328.13 ) local.trig setsize ( -50 -50 -0 ) ( 50 50 0 ) local.trig setthread Trigger1 local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area"
local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple local.trig.origin = ( -541.53 1144.96 520.13 ) local.trig setsize ( -50 -50 -0 ) ( 50 50 0 ) local.trig setthread Trigger1 local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area"
local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple local.trig.origin = ( -542.45 1671.03 520.13 ) local.trig setsize ( -50 -50 -0 ) ( 50 50 0 ) local.trig setthread Trigger1 local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area"
Thread Trigger1
Trigger1: self waittill trigger local.player=parm.other local.player kill
//*** Precache Dm Stuff exec global/DMprecache.scr
level.script = maps/dm/mohdm1.scr exec global/ambient.scr mohdm1
//exec global/ambient.scr mohdm2
//$world farplane 5000 //$world farplane_color (.333 .333 .329)
level waittill spawn all: while(1) { for(local.i = 1;local.i <= $player.size; local.i++) { $player[local.i] giveweapon weapons/kar98sniper.tik $player[local.i] giveweapon weapons/springfield.tik } wait 1 }
end
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
roundbasedthread:
// Can specify different scoreboard messages for round based games here.
level waitTill prespawn
level waittill spawn [/code]
well i am ok at modding i jsut Dont know anyting about Java lmao, I know TONS of stuff on MOh ..lmao they use Pk3's and .scr files
rep for doing this i guess not cuase its not useful,

item.title: MOHAA lmao idk randomsness
item.dc:creator: @Xykoran Xykoran
item.description:
@Xykoran wrote:

Some of u must have play MOHAA or one of the MOH, maybe COD…idk

but just for a giggly i am posting a map i edited,so people can see what i am God off,hehe

[code]// SOUTHERN FRANCE
// ARCHITECTURE: SENN
// SCRIPTING: POWZER

main:

// set scoreboard messages
setcvar “g_obj_alliedtext1” “Southern France”
setcvar “g_obj_alliedtext2” “208.101.42.36:12203”
setcvar “g_obj_alliedtext3” “Mods by Raven_weasel”
setcvar “g_obj_axistext1” “Southern France 2”
setcvar “g_obj_axistext2” “Small City”
setcvar “g_obj_axistext3” “Toy Soldiers”

setcvar “g_scoreboardpic” “mohdm1”

// call additional stuff for playing this map round based is needed
if(level.roundbased)
	thread roundbasedthread
	
level waitTill prespawn

local.fix1 = spawn script_model
local.fix1 model "static/lightpost_sidemounted.tik"
local.fix1.origin = ( 1366.00 1335.00 743.00 )
local.fix1.angles = ( 180 90 180 )

local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple
local.trig.origin = ( 1366.00 1335.00 760.00 )	
local.trig setsize ( -150 -150 -0 ) ( 150 150 0 )
local.trig setthread  Trigger1
local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area"

local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple
local.trig.origin = ( -395.29 112.88 461.49 )	
local.trig setsize ( -50 -25 -0 ) ( 50 25 0 )
local.trig setthread  Trigger1
local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area"
      local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple
local.trig.origin = ( -742.54 2190.88 644.13 )	
local.trig setsize ( -50 -50 -0 ) ( 50 50 0 )
local.trig setthread  Trigger1
local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area"

local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple
local.trig.origin = ( -634.49 1912.87 328.13 )	
local.trig setsize ( -50 -50 -0 ) ( 50 50 0 )
local.trig setthread  Trigger1
local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area"

local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple
local.trig.origin = ( -770.42 1912.87 328.13 )	
local.trig setsize ( -50 -50 -0 ) ( 50 50 0 )
local.trig setthread  Trigger1
local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area"

local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple
local.trig.origin = ( -541.53 1144.96 520.13 )	
local.trig setsize ( -50 -50 -0 ) ( 50 50 0 )
local.trig setthread  Trigger1
local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area"

local.trig = spawn trigger_multiple
local.trig.origin = ( -542.45 1671.03 520.13 )	
local.trig setsize ( -50 -50 -0 ) ( 50 50 0 )
local.trig setthread  Trigger1
local.trig message "Access Denied,Unlawfull Area"

Thread Trigger1

Trigger1:
self waittill trigger                         
local.player=parm.other                       
local.player kill

//*** Precache Dm Stuff
exec global/DMprecache.scr

level.script = maps/dm/mohdm1.scr
exec global/ambient.scr mohdm1

//exec global/ambient.scr mohdm2

//$world farplane 5000
//$world farplane_color (.333 .333 .329)

level waittill spawn
all:
while(1)
{
for(local.i = 1;local.i <= $player.size; local.i++)
{
$player[local.i] giveweapon weapons/kar98sniper.tik
$player[local.i] giveweapon weapons/springfield.tik
}
wait 1
}

end

//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

roundbasedthread:

// Can specify different scoreboard messages for round based games here.

level waitTill prespawn

level waittill spawn

[/code]

well i am ok at modding i jsut Dont know anyting about Java lmao, I know TONS of stuff on MOh …lmao they use Pk3’s and .scr files

rep for doing this i guess not cuase its not useful,

Read full topic
